RAMULUS nodded as he looke=
d around the cave and then back at NIGHT
SHIFT. =93I am sure that one of th=

There was a smile as RAMULUS turn=
ed to look back at NIGHT SHIFT,
=93Don=92t worry about it. It sounds like t=
he rain is beginning to let up.
We should hopefully be able to leave soon.=
=94

turn=
ing slowly from a down pour and becoming more of a drizzle. There

r.
